author: stevehay
msg: Fix t/apr-ext failures when building without optimization.
APLOG_USE_MODULE() in modperl_apache_includes.h expands to a reference to perl_module, which is optimized away by -O2 when it's not used, but -O0 keeps it.
Patch by Niko Tyni. See also https://bugs.debian.org/756989.

author: ehatcher
msg: SOLR-6062: Fix undesirable edismax query parser effect (introduced in SOLR-2058) in how phrase queries generated from pf, pf2, and pf3 are merged into the main query. (merged from trunk r1617719)
